name: Stella Meto
description:
It started as a simple experiment involving a triangle, a circle, and a tractor beam. It was maybe kind of fun.

So I thought what I'd do is evolve it a bit; the triangle morphed into a space ship and those circles became asteroids made of hexagons. Lasers got involved, a bigger ship entered the picture, and fuel and harvesting systems started to appear. Now this simple experiment is beginning to take shape as something that I think others might find maybe kind of fun.

Download it and let me know what you think. I'm just going to keep evolving this simple experiment bit by bit until maybe we can find some kind of fun.
